name: Loaded Dice (billbobphil)
description:
Created in 48 hours for the GTMK 2022 Gamejam with the theme of "Roll of the Dice".

Navigate through a series of 10 dice rolling challenges.

In each challenge you will need to meet or exceed the minimum die roll to proceed.

Optionally, wager your hard-earned cash for a chance at more riches.

Use your cash to purchase various boosts to increase your odds of success.

Controls: 

Mouse (Left-click only)

Spacebar - Advance tutorial

Backspace - Skip tutorial

Thanks for playing!
